column4: why does Gedit always leave these [filename]~ files of what I've been editing after I close it
Dr4m: right click the file, properties, open with and then select the radio button for that application
the files that end with ~ are generally backup files. a lot of editors do that, but you can disable it

nope.. it won't ;) imagine you edit a system file and something goes wrong.. in that case you still have the backup that was autogenerated.. if you want to handle backups yourself you can disable that stuff
